Keywords: Celebrity , Fantastic Four , Monster , Soldier
Real Name: Ben Grimm
Special Powers
IN THE BEGINNING: The Thing increases his attack total +1 for each 4 in his (finalized) attack roll.
TOGETHER WE STAND: Impervious. STOP, but only if there is another friendly character with the Fantastic Four keyword within four squares.

You get one good charge in with heavy object to clobber for 5 damage, then he's toast. Will go down quick. I dont know if 40 points is worth it for someone with such little survivability that has to be up close to fight..
